name: nymph-examples-todo-react
description: An example todo app using Nymph and React.

scripts.watch-notify: webpack --watch | /usr/bin/env bash -c 'while read -r line; do if [[ $line =~ built ]]; then /usr/bin/notify-send -t 400 "Ready"; fi ; echo $line; done'

author: Hunter Perrin <hperrin@gmail.com>
